casebody.data:
Mary N. GURGANUS
v.
Charles M. GURGANUS No. 99P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 James W. Lea, III, Attorney at Law, Paige Elizabeth Inman, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Gurganus, Charles M. Mark E. Sullivan, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Ashley L. Oldham, Attorney at Law, for Gurganus, Mary N.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 28th of March 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
